short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Too many tabs open? Get Tabber; the easy to use, fun, and quirky way to manage your browser tabs like a pro!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of endless browser tabs cluttering your screen and slowing down your productivity? Meet Tabber â€” your real-time tab management solution! With Tabber, you can easily organize your open tabs, streamline your workflow, and keep only what's truly important. Mark tabs as "Favorites" and close all the unnecessary ones with just a click. Simplify your browsing, reduce the chaos, and stay focused on what matters most. Get Tabber now and transform the way you manage your tabs!
